means: 极大的痛苦( agony的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: He endured agonies of loneliness and misery.
sentence.Network_cn: 他忍受着寂寞和贫穷的折磨.

sentence.Network_en: We found him in the agonies of death.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们看到他处于垂死的痛苦之中.

sentence.Network_en: He suffered agonies from his arm.

PerfectNetExp.abs: He suffered agonies of remorse ., 他饱受悔恨的煎熬.
agonies and consolations in this life ., 尘世的惶恐与安慰.
Sedley groaned in agonies which the pen refuses to describe ., 赛特笠在哼哼唧唧的忍受形容不出的苦楚.

entry.tran: （肉体或精神的）极度痛苦，创痛
entry.def: Agony is great physical or mental pain.

example.ex: A new machine may save thousands of animals from the agony of drug tests...
example.tran: 一种新型机器也许可以将成千上万的动物从药物试验的痛苦中解脱出来。
